title: 2 Easy Ways to Activate a Windows Product Key

steps.title: Open the Settings app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Settings app on your computer. You can find it on your Start menu , or use the search or Cortana button on your taskbar to quickly open it. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Select Updates & Security.
steps.content: Select Updates & Security . This option looks like two rotating arrows on the Settings menu. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click Activation on the left menu.
steps.content: Click Activation on the left menu. This will open your product activation options on the right-hand side. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click Change product key.
steps.content: Click Change product key . This will allow you to enter your 25-digit product key to activate Windows on your computer. [4] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source If you haven't purchased the full version of Windows yet, you can click Go to Store here, and purchase the full version from the online Windows Store.

steps.title: Enter your product key to activate.
steps.content: Enter your product key to activate. Type in your 25-digit product key, and click Activate to fully activate all of Windows's features on your computer. [5] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source You can find your product key in an email from whoever sold or distributed Windows to you. If you installed your system from an official Windows USB, you can find your product key on the box the USB came in.

steps.title: Remain connected to the Internet.
steps.content: Remain connected to the Internet. To ensure that your product key has not been used on another device, you must remain connected to the Internet to finish activation. If you do not have an Internet connection, you can activate over the phone.

steps.title: Press ⊞ Win+R.
steps.content: Press ⊞ Win + R . Type in slui 4 . [6] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Choose a language.
steps.content: Choose a language. Click on Next . [7] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Call the toll free number on-screen.
steps.content: Call the toll free number on-screen. This will connect you to the Microsoft activation center. [8] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Dial the CAPTCHA number provided.
steps.content: Dial the CAPTCHA number provided. As a measure against spam, only human callers are allowed to proceed to activate Windows.

steps.title: Enter the unique installation ID using the phone keypad.
steps.content: Enter the unique installation ID using the phone keypad. To do this, you will have to enter one group at a time. Each group is separated by spaces.

steps.title: Enter in the confirmation ID on your computer.
steps.content: Enter in the confirmation ID on your computer. Then choose Activate Windows . This will finish activation.
